sentences.english: For all the classic examples check out this previous article on attentional blindness.
sentences.chinese: 可以在之前的文章中查看有關注意視盲的經典案例。

sentences.english: Wray links this to theories of change blindness and inattentional blindness.
sentences.chinese: Wray將這與改變視盲和無意視盲理論相關聯。

sentences.english: Wray links this to theories of change blindness and inattentional blindness.
sentences.chinese: Wray將這與改變視盲和無意視盲理論相關聯。

sentences.english: Such a gap in perception is called inattentional blindness.
sentences.chinese: 這種感知空隙被稱爲“無意視盲”。
